title: Archlight Velkoz February sale

embed.description: Check out all the champs and skins on sale this February. Like previous sales schedules, we're not posting the exact dates for each champ and skin, but they'll all be on sale sometime next month, so keep an eye out.

body: Anybody know if or when Archlight Velkoz will be on sale? or have i alredy missed it?

replies.body: Those sales are posted to ensure players know what sales are coming up in the next month. Those sales aren't in order, so you just have to stay tuned to the skin sale rotations and snag that skin when it's discounted!
cool but has it already being onsale this month? hope i didnt miss it
It hasn't! So keep an eye out :)

[Surrender@20](http://www.surrenderat20.net/) post the skin sales as they go up (though some of the regions will have them up a little earlier or a little later than the post itself) , so if you watch there you will see when it goes on sale! Otherwise you can just keep checking the store as the rotations change :)
